review: Glad I picked up the  stick. Easy to install, setup and  use.
author: Chiefdnd

review: I bought this to use HBO go, and it won't let me because I have comcast. Shame.
author: paige

review: It's great!  It would be better with more free content. It seems like all the movies cost $4 each.
author: Brenda Case

review: Fire TV Stick works as advertised. I'm able to watch Amazon Prime and You Tube content on my HD TV. Using the remote to search for content is a little slower than normal internet search. I also had a small issue when plugging in the Stick to a power strip. TV could detect the Stick but I was not getting the menu / content to load. There problem was the Stick was not getting power despite being plugged in. Error message displayed on TV did not pinpoint the problem as lack of charge. I identified the issue by unplugging / reconnecting the device and discovered I had to wiggle the plug in the electric socket. Power light indicator on stick might be helpful.
author: John K. Waskiewicz

review: I like the way it works but am frustrated with some apps they let you watch 2 seasons then want you to pay for the 3rd
author: Terri Walker

review: Makes my life so much easier
author: Ju. Ju.

review: I've only used my Fire Stick for a very short while, but so far I am beyond thrilled! Easy to set up and easy to use. Woohoo!
author: Amber M "Blondie82479"
